dct_title_s: Watson's new map of New York and adjacent cities.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.  Shows radial distances from City Hall.  Also shows wards and elevated rail lines.  Includes text, street index, directories, inset of northwestern Bronx, and ill.
dcat_keyword_sm: Railroads, Elevated New York (State) New York Maps
New York (State) Administrative and Political Divisions Maps
